title: It's Time
lyrics: So this is what you meant when you said that you were spent? And now it's time to build from the bottom of the pit right to the top, Packing my bags and giving the academy a rain check I don't ever want to let you down I don't ever want to leave this town 'Cause after all It's time to begin, isn't it? I get a little bit bigger, but then, I'll admit, I'm just the same as I was Now don't you understand  So this is where you fell, and I am left to sell the path that heaven runs through miles of clouded hell, right to the top Turning to rags and give the commodities a rain check I don't ever want to let you down I don't ever want to leave this town 'Cause after all It's time to begin, isn't it? I get a little bit bigger, but then, I'll admit, I'm just the same as I was Now don't you understand This road never looked so lonely, This house doesn't burn down slowly, to ashes, to ashes... It's time to begin, isn't it? I get a little bit bigger, but then, I'll admit, I'm just the same as I was Now don't you understand
